scan_metadata.description: kms - Compliance Functions Mapping - OPTIMIZED VERSION
scan_metadata.optimization_notes: Intelligently categorized functions by cloud security expert analysis, grouped by service, simplified to 4 clear categories with execution types and remediation effort classification

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check CMK usage
check_functions.description: Checks if CMKs are used for encryption

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check CMK deletion
check_functions.description: Checks if CMKs are not deleted unintentionally

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check multi-region CMK
check_functions.description: Checks if CMKs are not multi-region

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check CMK rotation enabled
check_functions.description: Checks if CMK rotation is enabled

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check key public accessibility
check_functions.description: Checks if KMS key is not publicly accessible

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check CMK rotation enabled
check_functions.description: Checks if CMK rotation is enabled

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to audit encryption settings
check_functions.description: Audits encryption settings for KMS

check_functions.execution_type: Manual Effort - Review encryption settings
check_functions.description: Manual review of encryption settings for KMS

check_functions.description: Checks retirement and replacement of KMS keys

check_functions.description: Checks unauthorized substitution prevention for KMS keys
